abilities.name: Claws
abilities.description: Reptile slashes with his claws, dealing 300 damage to the player.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Reptile enters stealth mode for 7 seconds, becoming 80% transparent. While stealthed, the player cannot deal damage or use damage and damage all abilities on Reptile. Reptile can still use abilities while stealthed.
